content.body: In the HTML spec, what determines whether a `<dl>` is `class="switch"`?
content.formatted_body: In the HTML spec, what determines whether a <dl> is class="switch"?

content.body: E.g., if you search (case-insensitively) for "run the appropriate set", you get 5 hits, each followed by a `<dl>`, of which 3 are switches, and 2 aren't.
content.formatted_body: E.g., if you search (case-insensitively) for "run the appropriate set", you get 5 hits, each followed by a <dl>, of which 3 are switches, and 2 aren't.
